rev.desc.rev.desc: Panel : copy.properties,
For wizard-list, replace the format with correct place
Panel : copy.properties, copy.grid.properties
$L.new.columns.string1=strrep($L.old.table.string, $L.old.columns.string, $L.new.columns.string)
$L.new.columns.string2=jscall("dynamicFormGenerator.mergeTableAccessible", $L.new.table.string, $L.new.columns.string1)
11 in $L.new.line in field in $L.format=$L.new.columns.string2
This issue caused by our design limitation, when modify columns, the multi notebook/page/table are not be supported,
Add more panels to handle notebook:
copy.grid.properties.check
copy.grid.properties.notebook
On Dynamic Forms a translation by Display/Value List is not possible.
Correcting the tab setup due to source control problems.
Treats vies and inboxes the same.
removed temporary check $G.views.steve (task TA228)
Updated for task TA228. Added new parameter for passing in the inbox and if the inbox.class is set to "classView" then it will display the inbox "View".
Added a "." in front of "qbe.g" when setting up $L.grid.query.g
$L.grid.query.g=nullsub("name=\""+$L.name+".qbe.g\" and operator=\""+operator()+"\" and gridname=NULL", "false")
Complete rewrite of the application to clean up the logic flow.
Added parameter to allow generic base formats (for scmanage)
Modify columns now keeps all non-table widgets from the base format.
no changes.
Now retains the properties of the original table when creating a new format based the the usergrid file.

descript.descript: Panel : copy.properties,
For wizard-list, replace the format with correct place
Panel : copy.properties, copy.grid.properties
$L.new.columns.string1=strrep($L.old.table.string, $L.old.columns.string, $L.new.columns.string)
$L.new.columns.string2=jscall("dynamicFormGenerator.mergeTableAccessible", $L.new.table.string, $L.new.columns.string1)
11 in $L.new.line in field in $L.format=$L.new.columns.string2
This issue caused by our design limitation, when modify columns, the multi notebook/page/table are not be supported,
Add more panels to handle notebook:
copy.grid.properties.check
copy.grid.properties.notebook
On Dynamic Forms a translation by Display/Value List is not possible.
Correcting the tab setup due to source control problems.
Treats vies and inboxes the same.
removed temporary check $G.views.steve (task TA228)
Updated for task TA228. Added new parameter for passing in the inbox and if the inbox.class is set to "classView" then it will display the inbox "View".
Added a "." in front of "qbe.g" when setting up $L.grid.query.g
$L.grid.query.g=nullsub("name=\""+$L.name+".qbe.g\" and operator=\""+operator()+"\" and gridname=NULL", "false")
Complete rewrite of the application to clean up the logic flow.
Added parameter to allow generic base formats (for scmanage)
Modify columns now keeps all non-table widgets from the base format.
no changes.
Now retains the properties of the original table when creating a new format based the the usergrid file.
